an4.171:1.1: “Kaye va, bhikkhave, sati kayasancetanahetu uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:1.2: Vacaya va, bhikkhave, sati vacisancetanahetu uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:1.3: Mane va, bhikkhave, sati manosancetanahetu uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham avijjapaccayava.
an4.171:2.1: Samam va tam, bhikkhave, kayasankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:2.2: Pare vassa tam, bhikkhave, kayasankharam abhisankharonti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:2.3: Sampajano va tam, bhikkhave, kayasankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:2.4: Asampajano va tam, bhikkhave, kayasankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:3.1: Samam va tam, bhikkhave, vacisankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham;
an4.171:3.2: pare vassa tam, bhikkhave, vacisankharam abhisankharonti;
an4.171:3.4: sampajano va tam, bhikkhave, vacisankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham;
an4.171:3.5: asampajano va tam, bhikkhave, vacisankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:4.1: Samam va tam, bhikkhave, manosankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham;
an4.171:4.2: pare vassa tam, bhikkhave, manosankharam abhisankharonti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham;
an4.171:4.3: sampajano va tam, bhikkhave, manosankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham;
an4.171:4.4: asampajano va tam, bhikkhave, manosankharam abhisankharoti, yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
an4.171:5.2: avijjaya tveva asesaviraganirodha so kayo na hoti yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham, sa vaca na hoti yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham, so mano na hoti yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham,
an4.171:5.3: khettam tam na hoti …pe… vatthu tam na hoti …pe… ayatanam tam na hoti …pe… adhikaranam tam na hoti yampaccayassa tam uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkhanti.
an4.171:6.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhavapatilabho, yasmim attabhavapatilabhe attasancetana kamati, no parasancetana.
an4.171:6.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhavapatilabho, yasmim attabhavapatilabhe parasancetana kamati, no attasancetana.
an4.171:6.5: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhavapatilabho, yasmim attabhavapatilabhe attasancetana ca kamati parasancetana ca.
an4.171:6.6: Atthi, bhikkhave, attabhavapatilabho, yasmim attabhavapatilabhe nevattasancetana kamati, no parasancetana.
an4.171:7.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.171:7.2: “imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami:
an4.171:7.3: ‘tatra, bhante, yayam attabhavapatilabho yasmim attabhavapatilabhe attasancetana kamati no parasancetana, attasancetanahetu tesam sattanam tamha kaya cuti hoti.
an4.171:7.4: Tatra, bhante, yayam attabhavapatilabho yasmim attabhavapatilabhe parasancetana kamati no attasancetana, parasancetanahetu tesam sattanam tamha kaya cuti hoti.
an4.171:7.5: Tatra, bhante, yayam attabhavapatilabho yasmim attabhavapatilabhe attasancetana ca kamati parasancetana ca, attasancetana ca parasancetana ca hetu tesam sattanam tamha kaya cuti hoti.
an4.171:7.6: Tatra, bhante, yayam attabhavapatilabho yasmim attabhavapatilabhe neva attasancetana kamati no parasancetana, katame tena deva datthabba’”ti?
an4.171:8.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta tamha kaya cuta agamino honti agantaro itthattam?
an4.171:8.2: Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta tamha kaya cuta anagamino honti anagantaro itthattan”ti?
an4.171:8.3: “Idha, sariputta, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani appahinani honti, so dittheva dhamme nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.171:8.4: So tadassadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati;
an4.171:8.5: tattha thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihari aparihino kalam kurumano nevasannanasannayatanupaganam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.171:8.6: So tato cuto agami hoti aganta itthattam.
an4.171:9.1: Idha pana, sariputta, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani honti, so dittheva dhamme nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.171:9.2: So tadassadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati;
an4.171:9.3: tattha thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihari aparihino kalam kurumano nevasannanasannayatanupaganam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.171:9.4: So tato cuto anagami hoti anaganta itthattam.
an4.171:10.1: Ayam kho, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta tamha kaya cuta agamino honti agantaro itthattam.
an4.171:10.2: Ayam pana, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta tamha kaya cuta anagamino honti anagantaro itthattan”ti.
